summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 26th Avenue Northwest, from West 73rd Street to West 75th Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Resolution No. 9898 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
